mapper.select: SELECT C.CARDSEQ, C.CARDTITLE, C.CARDCONTENT, U.USERSEQ, C.CARDREADCOUNT, C.CARDDATE, CARDFILENAME, CARDDEL, U.NICKNAME, F.LIKECOUNT FROM USERS U, CARD_COLLECTIONS C, (SELECT CARDSEQ, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) LIKECOUNT FROM CARD_FAVORITE GROUP BY CARDSEQ) F WHERE U.USERSEQ=C.USERSEQ AND C.CARDSEQ=F.CARDSEQ(+) ORDER BY F.LIKECOUNT DESC NULLS LAST
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CARD_FAVORITE WHERE USERSEQ=#{userSeq} AND CARDSEQ=#{cardSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM CARD_REVIEW WHERE CARDSEQ=#{cardSeq} AND CARDREVDEL = 0
